approach: Asymmetric perturbations of baseline (offset rows, angle variations, staggered angles, non-uniform spacing) + SA optimization
conclusion: NO improvements found. The baseline is at an EXTREMELY STRONG LOCAL OPTIMUM that cannot be escaped even with asymmetric perturbations followed by SA optimization.
note: This is the CORRECT implementation of asymmetric perturbations (starting from baseline, not from scratch), but still no improvement.
